desc.cn: 擅长造成<#ba.noguard>破防</>和<#ba.physicalstatus>物理异常</>，同时兼具一定的伤害输出能力。
desc.en: Guards are skilled at making enemies <#ba.noguard>Vulnerable</> and applying <#ba.physicalstatus>Physical Statuses</>. They are also good damage dealers.

desc.cn: 拥有高生存能力，擅长保护和治疗队友，并对敌人发起反击。
desc.en: Defenders are extremely tough. They are skilled in protecting and treating their teammates, as well as counterattacking the enemy.

desc.cn: 擅长以各类控制效果削弱敌人，也能为其他干员提供增益和支援。
desc.en: Supporters are skilled in applying various control effects that weaken the enemy. They can also buff and support their teammates.

desc.cn: 擅长造成<#ba.spellinflict>法术附着</>和<#ba.spellstatus>法术异常</>，同时兼具一定的伤害输出能力。
desc.en: Casters are skilled at applying <#ba.spellinflict>Arts Inflictions</> and <#ba.spellstatus>Arts Reactions</>. They are also good damage dealers.

desc.cn: 擅长恢复技力，能帮助团队后续更好地施放技能。
desc.en: Great at recovering Skill Points (SP) to help their teammates' skill casting.

desc.cn: 依靠其他干员的物理和法术效果，从而提供决定性的伤害输出能力。
desc.en: Strikers exploit Physical or Arts effects inflicted by other operators to deal decisive damage.
